titleContent: Control incoming traffic to your zone by filtering requests based on location, IP address, user agent, URI, and more.

notif.form_error: Error: Please check the form error.
notif.create_fail: Failed to create. Please try again
notif.create_fail_quota: Failed to create. There are not available rules to create.
notif.upload_fail: WAF Rules is being deployed. Please try again.

tooltip.group_name: The group that you assigning for the rules
tooltip.waf_action: Action to perform when meet the conditions
tooltip.wafIp: The IPs to match the condition *Multiple IPs submit in newline
tooltip.requestUrl: The URL to match the condition *Multiple URL submit in newline *Regular Expression require in this field
tooltip.requestHeader: The header need to perform headers detection
tooltip.requestHeaderNotExist: The not exist header need to perform headers detection
tooltip.sourceCountry: The country to perform country detection
tooltip.proxyType: We use ip2proxy database, for more information, please look at ip2proxy (hyperlink to https://www.ip2proxy.com/)
tooltip.requestRate: The Request Rate detection. The formula is request/seconds. For example: 200/1 means 200 request per 1 second
tooltip.owasp: The OWASP based on generic vulnerability detection
tooltip.notWafIP: To exclude IPs perform the detection match the condition *Multiple IPs submit in newline
tooltip.notRequestUrl: To exclude URL perform the detection match the condition *Multiple URL submit in newline
tooltip.notRequestHeader: To exclude the headers perform the detection match the condition
